pages.text: Offering plates are a specifically designed way of presenting additional objects when performing $(cat:rituals)rituals$(). Not all rituals require the presence of these plates, but those that do will generally consumed the items presented.$(br2)Right-clicking with an item (or stack of items) will place them upon the plate, while right-clicking with an empty hand will remove them.

pages.title: Offering Plate
pages.text: $(br2)$(info) Sneaking will allow you to place a single item from a stack. Likewise, sneaking will allow you to remove a single item from the plate.
